wikipedia_page.main: Damian Le Bas (30 January 1963, Sheffield – 9 December 2017, Worthing) was a British artist associated with the Outsider Art (or "Art Brut") label, as well a leading exponent of the "Roma Revolution" in art.

response: Writing for Travellers' Times, the writer and artist Damian Le Bas noted Avebury's 50-year commitment to improving the lives of the Gypsy, Roma, Traveller community in the UK, calling him "one of the greatest friends the Travellers ever had."
Le Bas and her husband Damian Le Bas have been associated with Outsider Art, unconventional artists working outside the confines of the art establishment.
* Damian Le Bas, artist, lives in the town.
*Damian Le Bas (writer) (born 1963), British writer and journalist
*Damian Le Bas, 54, British artist.Damian Le Bas ist tot

Le Bas is the son of the artists Damian Le Bas and Delaine Le Bas. He grew up in Worthing, attending Christ's Hospital school and then reading Theology at St John's College, Oxford. His work as a journalist has included editorship of Travellers Times.

link_mentions.page: List of books featured on Book of the Week in 2018
response: * The Stopping Places by Damian Le Bas, read by the author
